title: FTSL-Based Distance Language Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in foundational language instruction and demonstrated language proficiency relevant to job duties
context.additional_context: An advanced language proficiency course for improving workplace efficiency among practicing professionals, applying Finkâ€™s Taxonomy of Significant Learning (FTSL) in an asynchronous LMS environment.

learning_goals: Learners complete projects by utilizing at least three advanced language expressions applicable to real-world situations.
Learners practice humanistic understanding (empathy, collaboration) at least twice in the language learning process through peer feedback.
Learners submit at least one reflection on the ethical aspects of language use.
Learners concretely propose ways to integrate learned language knowledge into their work environments.
Learners confirm over 80% achievement of learning outcomes through self-assessment and peer evaluation at the end of the course.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
